service.title: choice agent
service.description: This service helps you to access different career related services. It provides list of clickable options from [Resume Creation, Resume Optimiser, Job description comparison with resume, Cold mailing] and according to selected option it should trigger the respective subtask to perform it.

fields.choice:
Always ask this from user
Please choose a service out of the following options:
Resume Creation,
Resume Optimiser,
Job description
comparison with resume,
Cold mailing
As soon as the user chooses a choice trigger the respective subtask to get the response
fields.response: this field is the response from the triggered subtask after the user choose a choice. Never ask this from an user in any case.
